Audio.Locality: 10 km S Pocone on Transpantaneira, Mato Grosso
Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Response to playback by pair (male lower-pitched, female higher) about 7-12m up in short-stature semi-evergreen woodland.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Hylophilus pectoralis,Tolmomyias sulphurescens,Synallaxis albilora,Crypturellus undulatus,Basileuterus culicivorus,Conirostrum speciosum,Galbula ruficauda
